n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# dp[i] = max number of problems in a valid contest ending at i
dp = [1] * n

for i in range(1, n):
    # if a[i] is twice as big as a[j], then a[i] can't be included in a valid contest ending at j
    j = bisect.bisect_left(a, a[i] // 2)
    dp[i] = max(dp[i], dp[j - 1] + 1)

print(max(dp))
